title: Stream: Little Lungs – Rebuild
body:
Of the thousands of new artists I’ve listened to over the past twelve months, Chicago songstress [**Little Lungs**](http://www.facebook.com/littlelungs2) is certainly up there in terms of potential to cross over from blog-popular to mainstream success. With her delicate vocals and as equally fragile composition, there’s a really intoxicating aurora to her music, that’s deeply personal yet still accessible.

New EP **_Rebuild_** almost appears to be documenting the post-relationship haze; the acceptance, the moving on and the burning flares that point towards the future. With her Lana Del Rey / Nancy Sinatra drawl and simplistic yet haunting synth sections, the likes of _A Moment of Overwhelming Grief_ and EP closer _Rebuild_ showcase the under-produced pop that she does so well. Without meaning to sound condescending, nor taking anything away from her talent, with a greater production budget, there’s no telling where **Little Lungs** could end up. Check out the full EP below, and download it for free.
